uk.ac.imperial.vazels.reef.client.managers
Class ListedCollectionManager<Id,Man extends IManager>

java.lang.Object
  uk.ac.imperial.vazels.reef.client.managers.ListedCollectionManager<Id,Man>
Type Parameters:
Id - The type of item ids
Man - The type of item managers
All Implemented Interfaces:
IManager
Direct Known Subclasses:
DeletableListedCollectionManager, WorkloadManager
public abstract class ListedCollectionManager<Id,Man extends IManager>
extends java.lang.Object
implements IManager

Like CollectionManager but takes the ids of its managers from a requester. This way we don't need to manually add all the items.

Remember that manager methods affect the collection rather than individual items. Data still needs to be individually pulled or pushed for each item.

addItem

protected Man addItem(Id id)
Add a new item to the list. Warning: if the new manager thinks the item is already deleted, your returned manager will be your only link to it.

Parameters:
id - Id for the new manager.
Returns:
New manager for the item, or null if the id was already taken.

getCollectionManager

protected CollectionManager<Id,Man> getCollectionManager()
Returns the collection manager to be used by this manager.

This can be overwritten to allow more extensive managers.

Returns:
The collection manager for this manager.

addCollectionChanger

protected void addCollectionChanger(IManager man)
Called when a manager is added or removed that would change the collection. This means a real addition or deletion that would change the requested item list.

Parameters:
man - The manager in question.

clearCollectionChangers

protected void clearCollectionChangers()
Clears out the list of collection changes.
